pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Statistical Methods // Accompanies the book "Nonparametric Statistical Methods Using R" by Kloke and McKean (2014, ISBN:9781439873434). Includes methods, datasets, and random number generation useful for the study of robust and/or nonparametric statistics. Emphasizes classical nonparametric methods for a variety of designs --- especially one-sample and two-sample problems. Includes methods for general scores, including estimation and testing for the two-sample location problem as well as Hogg's adaptive method.
